00013 
00014 GaussPoint::GaussPoint( double alpha_in,
00015                         double weight_in,
00016                         double jacobian_in,
00017                         Material* mat_in,
00018                         int num,
00019                         double coor_x,
00020                         double coor_y,
00021                         double coor_z,
00022                         double dcx_in,
00023                         double dcy_in
00024                       )
00025     : i(num)
00026     , dim(2)
00027     , x(coor_x)
00028     , y(coor_y)
00029     , z(coor_z)
00030     , dcx(dcx_in)
00031     , dcy(dcy_in)
00032     , weight(weight_in)
00033     , jacobian(jacobian_in)
00034     , mat(mat_in)
00035     , shapeFun(0)
00036 {
00037   cout << "jacobian = " << jacobian << endl;
00038   alphaix = alpha_in;
00039   alphaiy = alpha_in;
00040 }

00046 
00047 void GaussPoint::addSupportNode( Node* node_in )
00048 {
00049   supportNodes.push_back( node_in );
00050   ++supportNodesSize;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void GaussPoint::findSupportNodes( std::map< int, Node* > & domainNodes )
00054 {
00055   double dix = alphaix * dcx;
00056   double diy = alphaiy * dcy;
00057   double minX = x - dix;
00058   double maxX = x + dix;
00059   double minY = y - diy;
00060   double maxY = y + diy;
00061 
00062   for ( std::map<int,Node*>::iterator it = domainNodes.begin();
00063         it != domainNodes.end();
00064         ++it)
00065   {
00066     if ( it->second->getx() >= minX && it->second->getx() <= maxX ){
00067       if ( it->second->gety() >= minY && it->second->gety() <= maxY ){
00068         supportNodes.push_back( it->second );
00069       }
00070     }
00071   }
00072   supportNodesSize = supportNodes.size();
00073   initializeMatVecs();
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 // for rectangular domains
00078 void GaussPoint::findSupportNodes( std::map< int, Node* > & domainNodes,
00079                                    double domain_minX,
00080                                    double domain_maxX,
00081                                    double domain_minY,
00082                                    double domain_maxY
00083                                  )
00084 {
00085   double dix = alphaix * dcx;
00086   double diy = alphaiy * dcy;
00087 
00088   for ( std::map<int,Node*>::iterator it = domainNodes.begin();
00089         it != domainNodes.end();
00090         ++it)
00091   {
00092     // First, check if bounding box is outside the cells' patch domain
00093     // and define the box of searching:
00094     double minX;
00095     double maxX;
00096     if (x - dix < domain_minX){
00097       minX = domain_minX;
00098       maxX = minX + 2*dix;
00099     } else if (x + dix > domain_maxX){
00100       maxX = domain_maxX;
00101       minX = maxX - 2*dix;
00102     } else{
00103       minX = x - dix;
00104       maxX = x + dix;
00105     }
00106     double minY;
00107     double maxY;
00108     if (y - diy < domain_minY){
00109       minY = domain_minY;
00110       maxY = minY + 2*diy;
00111     } else if (y + diy > domain_maxY){
00112       maxY = domain_maxY;
00113       minY = maxY - 2*diy;
00114     } else{
00115       minY = y - dix;
00116       maxY = y + dix;
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Search for nodes inside the box:
00120     if ( it->second->getx() >= minX && it->second->getx() <= maxX ){
00121       if ( it->second->gety() >= minY && it->second->gety() <= maxY ){
00122         supportNodes.push_back( it->second );
00123       }
00124     }
00125   }
00126   supportNodesSize = supportNodes.size();
00127   initializeMatVecs();
00128 }
00129 
00130 void GaussPoint::findSupportNodes( std::vector< Node* > & domainNodes )
00131 {
00132   double dix = alphaix * dcx;
00133   double diy = alphaiy * dcy;
00134   double minX = x - dix;
00135   double maxX = x + dix;
00136   double minY = y - diy;
00137   double maxY = y + diy;
00138 
00139   for ( std::vector< Node* >::iterator it = domainNodes.begin();
00140         it != domainNodes.end();
00141         ++it)
00142   {
00143     if ( (*it)->getx() >= minX && (*it)->getx() <= maxX ){
00144       if ( (*it)->gety() >= minY && (*it)->gety() <= maxY ){
00145         supportNodes.push_back( (*it) );
00146       }
00147     }
00148   }
00149   supportNodesSize = supportNodes.size();
00150   initializeMatVecs();
00151 }

00154 // for rectangular domains
00155 void GaussPoint::findSupportNodes( std::vector< Node* > & domainNodes,
00156                                    double domain_minX,
00157                                    double domain_maxX,
00158                                    double domain_minY,
00159                                    double domain_maxY
00160                                  )
00161 {
00162   double dix = alphaix * dcx;
00163   double diy = alphaiy * dcy;
00164 
00165   for ( std::vector< Node* >::iterator it = domainNodes.begin();
00166         it != domainNodes.end();
00167         ++it)
00168   {
00169     // First, check if bounding box is outside the cells' patch domain
00170     // and define the box of searching:
00171     double minX;
00172     double maxX;
00173     if (x - dix < domain_minX){
00174       minX = domain_minX;
00175       maxX = minX + 2*dix;
00176     } else if (x + dix > domain_maxX){
00177       maxX = domain_maxX;
00178       minX = maxX - 2*dix;
00179     } else{
00180       minX = x - dix;
00181       maxX = x + dix;
00182     }
00183     double minY;
00184     double maxY;
00185     if (y - diy < domain_minY){
00186       minY = domain_minY;
00187       maxY = minY + 2*diy;
00188     } else if (y + diy > domain_maxY){
00189       maxY = domain_maxY;
00190       minY = maxY - 2*diy;
00191     } else{
00192       minY = y - dix;
00193       maxY = y + dix;
00194     }
00195 
00196     // Search for nodes inside the box:
00197     if ( (*it)->getx() >= minX && (*it)->getx() <= maxX ){
00198       if ( (*it)->gety() >= minY && (*it)->gety() <= maxY ){
00199         supportNodes.push_back( (*it) );
00200       }
00201     }
00202   }
00203   supportNodesSize = supportNodes.size();
00204   initializeMatVecs();
00205 }

00207 void GaussPoint::shapeFunSolve( double q_in )
00208 {
00209 //   double dc = std::sqrt( std::pow(dcx,2) + std::pow(dcy,2) );
00210   double dc = (dcx + dcy)/2;
00211 
00212   if (!shapeFun) shapeFun =
00213         new ShapeFunctionRBF(2,
00214                             supportNodesSize,
00215                             0,
00216                             0,
00217                             alphaix,
00218                             dc,
00219                             q_in,
00220                             this );
00221 
00222   shapeFun->calc();
00223 
00225   for( i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i ){
00226     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(1,i), 0, 0+2*i);
00227     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(2,i), 1, 1+2*i);
00228     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(2,i), 2, 0+2*i);
00229     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(1,i), 2, 1+2*i);
00230   }
00231 }
00232 
00233 
00234 void GaussPoint::fillBTriangleFE( )
00235 {
00236   initializeMatVecs();
00237   
00238   if (!shapeFun) shapeFun =
00239         new ShapeFunctionTriangle( this );
00240   shapeFun->calc();
00243   for( i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i ){
00244     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(1,i), 0, 0+2*i);
00245     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(2,i), 1, 1+2*i);
00246     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(2,i), 2, 0+2*i);
00247     B.writeElement(shapeFun->getPhi(1,i), 2, 1+2*i);
00248   }
00249 }

00251 
00252 void GaussPoint::computeMij( )
00253 {
00257   int i, j;
00258   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00259     for (j=0; j<supportNodesSize; ++j){
00260       M.writeElement( mat->getDensity() * weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * shapeFun->getPhi(0,j) * jacobian, dim*i, dim*j );
00261       M.writeElement( mat->getDensity() * weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * shapeFun->getPhi(0,j) * jacobian, dim*i+1, dim*j+1 );
00262 //       M.writeElement( weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * shapeFun->getPhi(0,j) * jacobian, dim*i+2, dim*j+2 );
00263     }
00264   }
00265 //   cout << "Jacobian: " << jacobian << endl;
00266 //   cout << "weight: " << weight << endl;
00267 //   cout << "matrix M: " << M << endl;
00268 
00269 }

00271 
00272 void GaussPoint::computeKij( )
00273 {
00274   int i, j, m, n;
00275 
00277   for ( i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i ){
00278     for ( j=0; j<supportNodesSize; ++j ){
00279       for (  m=0; m<2; ++m ){
00280         for ( n=0; n<2; ++n ){
00281 //           K(2*i + m, 2*j + n) = Kij(m,n);
00282           K.writeElement(weight * (  B.readElement(m,m+2*i) * mat->getD().readElement(m,n) * B.readElement(n,n+2*j)
00283               + B.readElement(2,m+2*i) * mat->getD().readElement(2,2) * B.readElement(2,n+2*j) ) * jacobian,
00284             2*i + m,
00285             2*j + n);
00286         }
00287       }
00288 //       cout<< endl << "Ks, node=" << this->i << ", i=" << i << ", j=" << j
00289 //           << endl << Kij << endl << KijTest << endl;
00290     }
00291   }
00292 //   cout << "Jacobian: " << jacobian << endl;
00293 //   cout << "weight: " << weight << endl;
00294 //   cout << "matrix K: " << K << endl;
00295 
00296 }

00298 
00299 void GaussPoint::computeTension( )
00300 {
00301   for (int i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00302     tension(0)
00303         += mat->getD().readElement(0,0) * B.readElement(0,0+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUx()
00304         + mat->getD().readElement(0,1) * B.readElement(1,1+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUy();
00305     tension(1)
00306         += mat->getD().readElement(1,0) * B.readElement(1,0+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUx()
00307         + mat->getD().readElement(1,1) * B.readElement(1,1+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUy();
00308     tension(2)
00309         += mat->getD().readElement(2,2) * B.readElement(2,0+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUx()
00310         + mat->getD().readElement(2,2) * B.readElement(2,1+2*i) * supportNodes[i]->getUy();
00311   }
00312 
00313   for (int i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00314     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * tension.readElement(0) * jacobian, 3*i+0);
00315     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * tension.readElement(1) * jacobian, 3*i+1);
00316     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * tension.readElement(2) * jacobian, 3*i+2);
00317   }
00318 
00319 }
00320 
00321 void GaussPoint::computeNLTension( )
00322 {
00323   sigma.beProductTraOf( P, F );
00324   sigma *= F.determinant();
00325 
00326   for (int i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00327     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * sigma(0,0) * jacobian, 3*i+0);
00328     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * sigma(1,1) * jacobian, 3*i+1);
00329     r.writeElement(weight * shapeFun->getPhi(0,i) * sigma(0,1) * jacobian, 3*i+2);
00330   }
00331 
00332 }
00333 
00334 void GaussPoint::computeFint( )
00335 {
00336   fint.fillIdentity(0.);
00337   computeKij();
00338   lmx::Vector<data_type> disp( 2*supportNodesSize );
00339   for(int a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a){
00340     for(int j=0; j<2; ++j){
00341       disp(2*a+j) = supportNodes[a]->getU(j);
00342     }
00343   }
00344   fint.mult(K, disp);
00345 }
00346 
00347 
00348 void GaussPoint::computeFext( )
00349 {
00350   // Mass matrix must be computed previously
00351   fext.fillIdentity(0.);
00352   lmx::Vector<data_type> gravity( 2*supportNodesSize );
00353   for(int a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a){
00354     for(int j=0; j<2; ++j){
00355       gravity(2*a+j) = -Simulation::getGravity(j);
00356     }
00357   }
00358   fext.mult(M, gravity);
00359 }
00360 
00361 
00362 void GaussPoint::computeNLFint( )
00363 {
00364   F.zero();
00365   for(int i=0; i<2; ++i){
00366     for(int j=0; j<2; ++j){
00367       for(int k=0; k<supportNodesSize; ++k){
00368         F(i,j) += supportNodes[k]->getx(i) * shapeFun->getPhi(j+1,k);
00369       }
00370     }
00371   }
00372   mat->computeS( S, F );
00373   P.beProductOf( F, S );
00374   fint.fillIdentity(0.);
00375   for(int a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a){
00376     for(int j=0; j<2; ++j){
00377       for(int k=0; k<2; ++k){ //dot product
00378         fint(2*a+j) += weight * jacobian * P(j,k) * shapeFun->getPhi(k+1,a); //maybe P(j,i)?
00379       }
00380     }
00381   }
00382 }

00384 void GaussPoint::computeNLKij( )
00385 {
00386   // It fills the shared K matrix...
00387   // Constitutive component (similar to linear case):
00388   int a, b, m, n, i, j, k, l;
00389   data_type temp1, temp2;
00390   K.fillIdentity(0.);
00391 
00392 
00394   for ( a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a ){
00395     for ( b=0; b<supportNodesSize; ++b ){
00396       for (  m=0; m<2; ++m ){
00397         for ( n=0; n<2; ++n ){
00398           for (  i=0; i<2; ++i ){
00399             for ( j=0; j<2; ++j ){
00400 //           K(2*a + m, 2*b + n) = Kab(m,n);
00401 //               K(2*a + m, 2*b + n) += weight * F(m,i) * (  B.readElement(i,i+2*a) * mat->getC().readElement(i,j) * B.readElement(j,j+2*b)
00402 //                                    + B.readElement(2,i+2*a) * mat->getC().readElement(2,2) * B.readElement(2,j+2*b) )  * F(n,j) * jacobian;
00403               //optimized:
00404               temp1 = B.readElement(i,i+2*a);
00405               temp1*= mat->getC().readElement(i,j);
00406               temp1*= B.readElement(j,j+2*b);
00407               temp2 = B.readElement(2,i+2*a);
00408               temp2*= mat->getC().readElement(2,2);
00409               temp2*= B.readElement(2,j+2*b);
00410               temp1+= temp2;
00411               temp1*= weight;
00412               temp1*= F(m,i);
00413               temp1*= F(n,j);
00414               temp1*= jacobian;
00415               K(2*a + m, 2*b + n) += temp1;
00416             }
00417           }
00418         }
00419       }
00420     }
00421   }
00422 
00423   //Exactly the same as above but less efficient...
00424 //   for ( a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a ){
00425 //     for ( b=0; b<supportNodesSize; ++b ){
00426 //       for (  m=0; m<2; ++m ){
00427 //         for ( n=0; n<2; ++n ){
00428 //           for (  i=0; i<2; ++i ){
00429 //             for ( j=0; j<2; ++j ){
00430 //               for (  k=0; k<2; ++k ){
00431 //                 for ( l=0; l<2; ++l ){
00432 // //                   K(2*i + m, 2*j + n) = Kij(m,n);
00433 //                   K(2*a+m, 2*b+n) += weight * jacobian * ( F(m,i) * shapeFun->getPhi(j+1,a) *mat->getCsym(i,j,k,l) * shapeFun->getPhi(k+1,b) * F(n,l) );
00434 // //                   K(2*a + i, 2*b + k) += weight * jacobian * ( shapeFun->getPhi(j+1,a) *mat->getCsym(i,j,k,l) * shapeFun->getPhi(l+1,b) );
00435 //                 }
00436 //               }
00437 //             }
00438 //           }
00439 //         }
00440 //       }
00441 //     }
00442 //   }
00443 
00444   // Initial Stress component:
00445   data_type phiSphi = 0.;
00446   for ( a=0; a<supportNodesSize; ++a ){
00447     for ( b=0; b<supportNodesSize; ++b ){
00448       for (  i=0; i<2; ++i ){
00449         for ( j=0; j<2; ++j ){
00450           phiSphi += shapeFun->getPhi(i+1,a) * S(i,j) * shapeFun->getPhi(j+1,b);
00451         }
00452       }
00453       phiSphi *= weight;
00454       phiSphi *= jacobian;
00455       K(2*a + 0, 2*b + 0) +=  phiSphi;
00456       K(2*a + 1, 2*b + 1) +=  phiSphi;
00457       phiSphi = 0.;
00458     }
00459   }
00460

00462 //   double Ax = 1E-7;

00551 }
00552 
00553 
00554 void GaussPoint::assembleMij( lmx::Matrix< data_type > & globalMass)
00555 {
00556   int i, j, m, n;
00557   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00558 //     cout<<"node: "<< supportNodes[i]->nodeNumber() << " "
00559 //         <<supportNodes[i]->getx() << " "
00560 //         <<supportNodes[i]->gety() << " " << endl ;
00561     for (j=0; j<supportNodesSize; ++j){
00562       for (m=0; m<2; ++m){
00563         for (n=0; n<2; ++n){
00564           globalMass( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + m, 2*supportNodes[j]->getNumber() + n)
00565               += M.readElement(2*i + m, 2*j + n);
00566         }
00567       }
00568     }
00569   }
00570 //   cout << endl;
00571 }
00572 
00573 
00574 void GaussPoint::assembleKij( lmx::Matrix< data_type > & globalTangent)
00575 {
00576   int i, j, m, n;
00577   for ( i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i ){
00578 //     cout<<"node: "<< supportNodes[i]->nodeNumber() << " "
00579 //         <<supportNodes[i]->getx() << " "
00580 //         <<supportNodes[i]->gety() << " " << endl ;
00581     for ( j=0; j<supportNodesSize; ++j ){
00582       for ( m=0; m<2; ++m ){
00583         for ( n=0; n<2; ++n ){
00584           globalTangent( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + m, 2*supportNodes[j]->getNumber() + n)
00585               += K.readElement(2*i + m, 2*j + n);
00586         }
00587       }
00588     }
00589   }
00590 //   cout << endl;
00591 }
00592 
00593 void GaussPoint::assembleRi( lmx::Vector< data_type > & globalR, int firstNode )
00594 {
00595 //   cout << "Size = " << globalR.size() << "solving tensions..." << endl;
00596 //   cout << "Size = " << r.size() << "solving tensions..." << endl;
00597 
00598   int i, m;
00599   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00600       for (m=0; m<3; ++m){
00601         globalR( 3*(supportNodes[i]->getNumber() - firstNode) + m) += r.readElement(3*i + m);
00602       }
00603   }
00604 }

00607 void GaussPoint::assembleFint(lmx::Vector< data_type > & globalFint)
00608 {
00609   int i, m;
00610   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00611     for (m=0; m<2; ++m){
00612       globalFint( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + m) += fint.readElement(2*i + m);
00613     }
00614   }
00615 }
00616 
00617 
00618 void GaussPoint::assembleFext(lmx::Vector< data_type > & globalFext)
00619 {
00620   int i, m;
00621   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00622     for (m=0; m<2; ++m){
00623       globalFext( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + m) += fext.readElement(2*i + m);
00624     }
00625   }
00626 }

00628 
00629 double GaussPoint::calcPotentialE( const lmx::Vector<data_type> & q )
00630 {
00631   double potential=0;
00632   int i, m;
00633   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00634     for (m=0; m<2; ++m){
00635       potential -= q.readElement( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + m) * fext.readElement(2*i + m);
00636     }
00637   }
00638 
00639   return potential;
00640 }
00641 
00642 
00643 double GaussPoint::calcKineticE( const lmx::Vector<data_type> & qdot )
00644 {
00645   double kinetic=0;
00646   int i, n, j, m;
00647   for (i=0; i<supportNodesSize; ++i){
00648     for (n=0; n<2; ++n){
00649       for (j=0; j<supportNodesSize; ++j){
00650         for (m=0; m<2; ++m){
00651           kinetic -= 0.5
00652               * qdot.readElement( 2*supportNodes[i]->getNumber() + n)
00653               * M.readElement( 2*i + n, 2*j + m )
00654               * qdot.readElement( 2*supportNodes[j]->getNumber() + m);
00655         }
00656       }
00657     }
00658   }
00659 
00660   return kinetic;
00661 }
00662 
00663 double GaussPoint::calcElasticE( )
00664 {
00665   double elastic = mat->computeEnergy( S );
00666   elastic *= weight * jacobian;
00667 
00668   return elastic;
00669 
00670 }

00672 void GaussPoint::gnuplotOut( std::ofstream& gpdata )
00673 {
00674   std::ofstream this_gp("onegp.dat");
00675   std::ofstream this_gp_sup_nodes("onegpsupportnodes.dat");
00676 
00677   gpdata << x << " " << y << " " << z << endl;
00678   this_gp << x << " " << y << " " << z << endl;
00679 
00680   // For output of support nodes.
00681   for ( std::vector<Node*>::iterator it = supportNodes.begin();
00682         it != supportNodes.end();
00683         ++it)
00684   {
00685     this_gp_sup_nodes << (*it)->getx() << " " << (*it)->gety() << " " << (*it)->getz() << endl;
00686   }
00687 
00688   // For output of shape function.
00689   this->shapeFun->gnuplotOut();
00690 
00691   std::ofstream out("gnuplot.plt");
00692 
00693   out << "#!/usr/bin/gnuplot -persist" << endl;
00694   out << "#         G N U P L O T" << endl;
00695   out << "set encoding iso_8859_1" << endl;
00696   out << "set terminal x11" << endl;
00697   out << "set key nobox right spacing 1.7" << endl;
00698   out << "set xlabel \"\\textsf{X}\"" << endl;
00699   out << "set ylabel \"\\textsf{Y}\"" << endl;
00700   out << "set zlabel \"\\textsf{Z}\"" << endl;
00701   out << "set title \"\\textsf{title}\"" << endl;
00702   out << "set xrange [*:*]" << endl;
00703   out << "set yrange [*:*]" << endl;
00704   out << "set zrange [*:*]" << endl;
00705   out << "set samples 25; set isosamples 20" << endl;
00706 //   out << "set pm3d; set hidden" << endl;
00707   out << "plot 'onegp.dat' with points ps 1 palette" << endl;
00708   out << "replot 'onegpsupportnodes.dat' with points ps 2 palette" << endl;
00709   out << "pause -1" << endl;
00710   out << "splot 'shapefunction.dat' with lines palette linewidth 4" << endl;
00711   out << "pause -1" << endl;
00712 
00713 //   system("gnuplot -bg white gnuplot.plt");
00714 }
00715 
00716 void GaussPoint::gnuplotOutTension( std::ofstream & gptension )
00717 {
00718   gptension << x << " " << y << " " << tension(0) << endl;
00719 }
00720 
00721 void GaussPoint::initializeMatVecs()
00722 {
00723   B.resize( 3, dim*supportNodesSize );
00724 
00725   M.resize( dim*supportNodesSize, dim*supportNodesSize );
00726   K.resize( dim*supportNodesSize, dim*supportNodesSize );
00727   tension.resize( 3 );
00728   r.resize( 3*supportNodesSize );
00729   fext.resize( dim*supportNodesSize );
00730   fint.resize( dim*supportNodesSize );
00731 }
